unittitle.value: Linda Nakdimen papers and Henry Ward Beecher Anniversary photographs

abstract.label: Abstract
abstract.value: These papers include correspondence, photographs, and newspaper clippings, dating from 1986 to 1997. The correspondence is between Linda Nakdimen and Stuyvesant "Peter" Barry and Alice Trumbull (Scoville) Barry, the great-great-granddaughter of Henry Ward Beecher. The photographs document the 100th year anniversary celebration of Beecher's death in 1987 and the 150th anniversary celebration of the founding of Plymouth Church in 1997. The newspaper clippings are related to the celebrations and Beecher's life.

p.value: Identification of item, date (if known); Linda Nakdimen papers and Henry Ward Beecher Anniversary photographs, 2008.038, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

For more information on Plymouth Church and Henry Ward Beecher, see the 
                <extref ns2:href="http://dlib.nyu.edu/findingaids/html/bhs/arc_212_plymouth_beecher/bioghist.html">Guide to the Plymouth Church of the Pilgrims and Henry Ward Beecher Collection, 1819-1980</extref>

These papers include correspondence, photographs, and newspaper clippings, dating from 1986 to 1997. The correspondence is between Linda Nakdimen and Stuyvesant "Peter" Barry and Alice Trumbull (Scoville) Barry, the great-great-granddaughter of Henry Ward Beecher. The photographs document the 100th year anniversary celebration of Beecher's death in 1987 and the 150th anniversary celebration of the founding of Plymouth Church in 1997. The newspaper clippings are related to the celebrations and Beecher's life.
